New Records: Fazalhaq Farooqi recorded his maiden five-wicket haul in international cricket during the match.
Afghanistan's opening partnership of 154 runs between Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran was the second-highest in the T20 World Cup.
Key Match Events: Fazalhaq Farooqi struck two consecutive wickets to be on a hat-trick for the second time in the match.
Afghanistan defended 183 runs against Uganda with a strong bowling performance led by Farooqi and Mujeeb Ur Rahman.
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan's opening batters, Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran, were expected to provide a strong start with their aggressive approach.
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan celebrated the win with Uganda's captain Brian Masaba dismissed during the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played under challenging batting conditions, contributing to the high-score chase.
